\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLWorkbook Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}\index{OpenXLSX::XLWorkbook@{OpenXLSX::XLWorkbook}}


This class encapsulates the concept of a Workbook. It provides access to the individual sheets (worksheets or chartsheets), as well as functionality for adding, deleting, moving and renaming sheets.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLWorkbook.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class encapsulates the concept of a Workbook. It provides access to the individual sheets (worksheets or chartsheets), as well as functionality for adding, deleting, moving and renaming sheets. Inheritance diagram for Open\+XLSX\+::XLWorkbook\+:\begin{figure}[H]
\begin{center}
\leavevmode
\includegraphics[height=2.000000cm]{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}
\end{center}
\end{figure}

\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{XLWorkbook()}{XLWorkbook()}\hspace{0.1cm}{\footnotesize\ttfamily [1/3]}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLWorkbook\+::\+XLWorkbook (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_xml_data}{XLXml\+Data}} $\ast$}]{xml\+Data }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [explicit]}}



Constructor. Takes a pointer to an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_xml_data}{XLXml\+Data}} object (stored in the parent \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} object). 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em xml\+Data} & A pointer to the underlying \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_xml_data}{XLXml\+Data}} object, which holds the XML data. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
Do not create an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_workbook}{XLWorkbook}} object directly. Get access through the an \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_document}{XLDocument}} object. 
\end{DoxyNote}

\index{deleteSheet@{deleteSheet}!OpenXLSX::XLWorkbook@{OpenXLSX::XLWorkbook}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{deleteSheet()}{deleteSheet()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLWorkbook\+::delete\+Sheet (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const std\+::string \&}]{sheet\+Name }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Delete sheet (worksheet or chartsheet) from the workbook. 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em sheet\+Name} & Name of the sheet to delete. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

\begin{DoxyExceptions}{Exceptions}
{\em \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_exception}{XLException}}} & An exception will be thrown if trying to delete the last worksheet in the workbook \\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}
\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
A workbook must contain at least one worksheet. Trying to delete the last worksheet from the workbook will trow an exception. 
\end{DoxyWarning}

{\footnotesize\ttfamily \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet}{XLSheet}} Open\+XLSX\+::\+XLWorkbook\+::sheet (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{uint16\+\_\+t}]{index }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Get the sheet (worksheet or chartsheet) at the given index. 


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em index} & The index at which the desired sheet is located. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A pointer to an XLAbstract\+Sheet with the sheet at the index. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\begin{DoxyNote}{Note}
The index must be 1-\/based (rather than 0-\/based) as this is the default for Excel spreadsheets. 
\end{DoxyNote}
